value.0: This strange jewel seems to have some unnatural power born into it. Upon examination one would sense a life force emanating from within, the gem itself contains the soul of another sentient creature. Undoubtedly captured by some maleficent being, such a succubus or a pit fiend. Various types of fiends use these gems as capital. It is the blood money of both the Nine Hells and the Abyss.
